spec.name: School Notre Dame Ain Sebaa
spec.description: School Notre Dame Ain Sebaa (École Notre Dame d'Aïn Sebaa) is a private Catholic school located in the Aïn Sebaa neighborhood of Casablanca. Part of the Catholic educational network, the school provides primary and/or secondary education and serves the local community, including the Christian expatriate community. It emphasizes quality education within a religious framework.

access.comment: Access is restricted primarily to students, staff, and authorized personnel.
